summary: A LIFE AND SAFETY ISSUE! WITH NO WARNING THE VEHICLE WILL SUDDENLY SHUT OFF.  IT DOES NOT MATTER IF YOU'RE MOVING ON THE FREEWAY OR PARKED, IT IS VERY INTERMITTENT AND ONLY HAPPENED THREE TIMES IN THE LAST 6 TO 8 WEEKS. TWO DIFFERENT MECHANICS SAID ERROR IT'S CODE P1682 IS THE FAULT BUT IT WILL NOT DUPLICATE THE SYMPTOMS.  I CONTACTED CHEVY CORPORATE AND THEY KNOWLEDGE OTHER VEHICLES THIS YEAR HAVE A RECALL BUT CLAIM MICE VIN NUMBER IS NOT AFFECTED AND WILL DO NOTHING. HEY FUEL VEHICLE IS IN SAFE AND DO NOT WANT MY FAMILY IN IT UNTIL I AM CERTAIN IT WILL NOT SUDDENLY SHUT OFF WHILE THEY ARE IN MOTION.
